title: Silicone emulsion
content:
Product Brand Catalog No. Nonvolatile content Features and application
Silicone wax FUTURSIL E-8273 97% A silicone / organic wax dispersion used to lubricate polyester sewing threads. Provides uniform distribution over the entire thread surface resulting in thread with low friction characteristics.
Silicone fluid emulsion HDE60 ≥60% A 60% actives non-ionic emulsion formulated with a polydimethlsiloxane. Applications include mold release of rubber or plastic parts (stoppers, screw tops, bungs, etc.), lubrication of extruded rubber parts conveyor belts, textile lubricant for yarn manufacture, sewing thread lubrication, hosiery manufacture and sewing needle.
HDE65 ≥60%

title: Silicone Intermediates
content:
Product Brand Features and application
Linear DOW/WACKER/BLUESTAR Low viscosity, reactive silanol fluid
D4 A base fluid in a number of personal care products, with excellent spreading and lubrication properties and unique volatility characteristics.Can be used in antiperspirants, deodorants, skin creams, lotions, bath oils, suntan and
shaving products, make-up, nail polishes.In hair sprays; faster drying time in low VOC formula.

title: Amino silicone oil
content:
Brand
 Catalog No. Nitrogen Viscosity (CST) Features and application
BLUESTAR C845 0.4 4500 Silicone oil with diamine functions, mainly
intended for the formulation of textile finishing emulsions.
BLUESTAR C910 0.8 1500 Specially developed for formulation to emulsions for textile softening.
DOW OFX-8040 0.4 1000 Suitable for formulation to a micro emulsion, and, in this form, can be applied to all types of woven or knitted fabric imparting a soft handle
DOW OFX-8468 0.6 5000-15000 A 100% actives amino functional siloxane polymer. It is used primarily in textile softening applications.
DOW OFX-8417 0.9 1200 Premium amino softener suitable for formulation into microemulsion which can be applied by exhaustion and padding as textile softener.
WACKER WR301 0.27 1000 Particularly suitable as active substance in softener formulations for the impregnation of fibers and textiles.
WACKER WR1100 0.15 5000 Particularly suitable as active substance in softener formulations for the impregnation of fibers and textiles.
WACKER WR1200 0.24 7000 Particularly suitable as active substance in softener formulations for the impregnation of PES-fibers and PES-textiles.
WACKER WR1300 0.3 1000 Particularly suitable as active substance in softener formulations for the impregnation of fibers and textiles.

title: Others
content:
Product Brand Catalog No. Active ingredient Features and application
Tallow amine polyoxyethylene ether FUTURSIL
 		1815
 		≥99% Amphoteric surfactants are non-ionic in acid media. It has excellent emulsification, dispersion, solubilization, antistatic and lubricating properties.
Alkyl diphenyl ether disulfonate DOW
 		2A1
 		45% Amphoteric surfactants are non-ionic in acid media. It has excellent emulsification, dispersion, solubilization, antistatic and lubricating properties.
Seconary Alkane Sulphonate Sodium Archroma
 		SAS-60
 		60% Anionic surfactant, has strong penetration under strong alkali and high temperature conditions, and has the functions of emulsification, deoiling and washing
Sodium dodecyl sulfonate FUTURSIL
 		K12
 		≥94% Emulsion polymerization anionic emulsifier, detergent ingredient
Fatty alcohol polyoxyethylene lauryl ether sulfate sodium FUTURSIL AES 70% Alkaline anionic surfactant, easily soluble in water, has excellent decontamination, emulsification and foaming properties. Used in textile industry wetting agent, detergent, daily chemical shampoo, etc.
Sodium lauryl sulfate FUTURSIL SLES 70%

In cosmetic industry, it is used for preparing lavation cosmetic, including the high-end liguid soap, shampoo, compound soap, bath foam and cleanser.

In the detergent industry, it is used for preparing liquid detergent and mixed washing powdel(soap), owning the function of foaming, decontamination, and solubilizing. It is always be used for non-phosphorus, low-phosphorous, heavy-dirty, and degreasing detergent.

In textile industry, printing and dyeing, leather industry, it’s used as lubricant, levelling agent cleaning and foaming agent static electricity remover and degreasing agent.
